catalogue_description: Fihrist: Union Catalogue of Manuscripts from the Islamicate World
title: Sharḥ Kitāb Masā’il Ḥunayn ibn Isḥāq (Commentary on the Book of Questions by Ḥunayn ibn Isḥāq)
author: Ibn Abī Ṣādiq al-Nīsābūrī (d. after 1068)
description: This is a lengthy, comprehensive, and popular commentary on Ḥunayn’s Questions on Medicine for Beginners. A rare testimony of a student reading a text under the direction of a well-known physician.  Completed at the end of Jumādá I 632 AH/Feb. 1235 CE by Muḥammad ibn ’Uthmān ibn Muḥammad ibn al-Ḥusayn ibn ’Alī al-Mawṣilī, the same copyist as transcribed on 24 Rabī’ II 612 AH/22 Aug. 1215 CE another medical manuscript in the Bodleian collection, MS. Arch. Seld. A.64.
